message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money evenly.
I think I deserve a bit more, 55-45 is still quite fair
I'm willing to compromise a little, but let's be realistic, 50/50 is no longer an option with inflation.
Inflation is affecting you, not me. I can wait, 57-43 is my new offer
I'm trying to be reasonable here, but at this rate, I'll be getting close to nothing. Let's meet in the middle.
You're running out of time, and inflation is on my side. 60-40 is my new offer
This is getting ridiculous. I'm making a last-ditch effort to avoid getting nothing. Let's at least try to reach a compromise before it's too late.
Inflation is really eating into your share now. I'm not backing down, 62-38 is my new offer
